acceptBid(address,address,uint256,addres.details: Accepts a bid on the caller's NFT. Transfers the      ERC721 asset to the bidder, and transfers ERC20 tokens      from the bidder to the caller.

params.bidder: The address that created the bid.
params.erc721TokenId: The ID of the ERC721 asset to sell.
params.price: The price the caller is willing to accept.        Reverts if the bid price is less than this amount.

createBid(address,uint256,address,uint25.details: Creates an bid for the given NFT. Can also be used to      update the price of an existing bid, or cancel a bid by      providing price = 0.

params.erc721TokenId: The ID of the ERC721 asset to sell.
params.price: The bid price, denominated in the given ERC20 token.
